summary.para: Represents the toolbar used to manage a report.
Initializes a new class instance .
Provides access to the tool bar button responsible for specifying color of the prievew background.
Provides access to the tool bar button responsible for closing the preview.
Provides access to the tool bar button responsible for moving to the first page of the prievew.
Provides access to the tool bar button responsible for displaying the Page Content Editor dialog.
Provides access to the tool bar button responsible for moving to the last page of the prievew.

Provides access to the tool bar button responsible for working with magnifier. When the magnifier is on cursor has a form of a magnifier and a click on a prievew page leads to changing the magnification degree of the report. There are two possible values of the magnification. The uppermost value of the magnification degree is always fixed and is equal to 100 %. The lowest magnification degree value is calculated so that the whole prievew page is visible at one and the same time without the need to scroll.

para.para: Provides access to the tool bar button responsible for displaying the page preview layout designer. The page preview layout designer allows to specify the number of pages to be simultaniously displayed in the preview. The following screen-shot displays the designer.

summary.para: Provides access to the tool bar button responsible for moving to the next page of the prievew.
Provides access to the tool bar button responsible for invoking the printer setup dialog.
Provides access to the tool bar button responsible for moving to the previous page of the prievew.
Provides access to the tool bar button responsible for printing the preview. Unlike the the btnPrint invokes the printer setup dialog.
Provides access to the tool bar button responsible for direct printing of the preview. This is useful when you need not to change your printer settings.

Provides access to the tool bar button responsible for invoking the property editor of the component which 's about to be printed. The button is accessible only if the component implements the IPrintable interface.

Provides access to the tool bar button responsible for providing a list of predefined zoom factors. A click on the button exposes a drop-down list of the available zoom factor values. They are as follows: 10%, 25%, 75%, 100%, 150%, 200% and 500%.

Provides access to the tool bar button responsible for zooming the preview in. Each time the button is clicked the preview gets zoomed in by about a 10%. You can use the button to zoom the preview out.

Provides access to the tool bar button responsible for zooming the preview out. Each time the button is clicked the preview gets zoomed out by about a 10%. You can use the button to zoom the preview in.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraPrinting.Preview.PrintPreviewBar.PrintControl

summary.para: Gets or sets a class instance to which the Print Preview Bar belongs.

member.value: A class instance to which the Print Preview Bar belongs.

summary.para: Provides access to the first tool bar separator which forms the group of the printing and settings buttons.
Provides access to the second tool bar separator which forms the group of "navigators" and separates it from the "magnifiers" to the left and from the "miscellaneous" buttons to the right.
Provides access to the second tool bar separator which forms the group of "magnifiers" and separates it from the settings and printing group to the left and from the "navigation" group to the right.
